pullrequest.title: Change segtools-aggregation to output a mx1 column rather than a mxn grid.

content.raw: @hoffman printing out num_rows, num_cols before and after the lines deleted in this pull request yields the values (3,4) before, and (6,2) after. Going back in the bitbucket commit history, transpose.levels has always been there and I believe its function is just to transpose the data dataframe such that the label numbers are ordered.
content.html: @hoffman printing out num_rows, num_cols before and after the lines deleted in this pull request yields the values (3,4) before, and (6,2) after. Going back in the bitbucket commit history, transpose.levels has always been there and I believe its function is just to transpose the data dataframe such that the label numbers are ordered.
